scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:contract && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run deploy:contract

wasmStudio.name: TodoMVC with persistence on blockchain
wasmStudio.description:
This project template contains the implementation of a blockchain-based TODO application. It is intended to show you a basic example of an app built on and deployed to the NEAR blockchain. 

It demonstrates a web frontend connection and JSON serialization.
